snippets:
[
    // Math mode
    {trigger: "mk", replacement: "$$0$", options: "tA"},
    {trigger: "c$", replacement: "$\\ce{ $0 }$", options: "tA"},
    // {trigger: "dm", replacement: "$$\n$0\n$$", options: "tAw"},
    {trigger: "beg", replacement: "\\begin{$0}\n$1\n\\end{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bespl", replacement: "\\begin{split}\n$0\n\\end{split}", options: "mA"},   

    // Misc.
    // {trigger: "lo", replacement: "l_{o}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "adj", replacement: "\\text{adj }", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "ve", replacement: "\\vee ", options: "mA", priority: -1},
    // {trigger: "wed", replacement: "\\wedge ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "fbox", replacement: "\\fbox{$0}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "fal;", replacement: "\\forall\\ ", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "anti", replacement: "^{*}", options: "rmA"},

    // Physical Chemistry 
    {trigger: "Mcond", replacement: "\\Lambda_{m}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Mocond", replacement: "\\Lambda^{o}_{m}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "mcond", replacement: "\\lambda_{m}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "mocond", replacement: "\\lambda^{o}_{m}", options: "rmA"},
    
    {trigger: "Ece", replacement: "E_{cell}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "E_{cell}no", replacement: "E^{o}_{cell}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Rat", replacement: "Rate", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tha", replacement: "t_{1/2}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "t_{1/2}([A-Z])", replacement: "t_{1/2([[0]])}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "]t", replacement: "]_{t}", options: "rmA"},
    
    {trigger: "p([A-Z])", replacement: "p_{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "x([A-Z])", replacement: "x_{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "y([A-Z])", replacement: "y_{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},

    // Thermodynamics
    {trigger: "sys", replacement: "_{sys}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "sur", replacement: "_{sur}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "rev", replacement: "_{rev}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "irr", replacement: "_{irr}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Gr", replacement: "G_{r}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Hr", replacement: "H_{r}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Hf", replacement: "H_{f}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Sr", replacement: "S_{r}", options: "rmA"},

    
    // Equilibrium Constants
    {trigger: "ka", replacement: "k_{a}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "kb", replacement: "k_{b}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "kh", replacement: "k_{h}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "kw", replacement: "k_{w}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "kin", replacement: "k_{In}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "ksp", replacement: "k_{sp}", options: "rmA"},
    
    {trigger: "CP", replacement: "C_{P}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "CV", replacement: "C_{V}", options: "rmA"},
    
    // P & C
    // {trigger: "C", replacement: "{}^{$0}C_{$1}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "chos", replacement: "{$0 \\choose $1}", options: "rmA"},
    // {trigger: "P", replacement: "{}^{$0}P_{$1}", options: "rm"},

    // Centre of Mass and RBD
    {trigger: "\\vec{r}com", replacement: "\\vec{r}_{com}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "rcom", replacement: "r_{com}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\vec{v}com", replacement: "\\vec{v}_{com}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\vec{a}com", replacement: "\\vec{a}_{com}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\vec{a}(\\d)", replacement: "\\vec{a}_{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "acom", replacement: "a_{com}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "xcom", replacement: "x_{com}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "ycom", replacement: "y_{com}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "zcom", replacement: "z_{com}", options: "rmA"},

    {trigger: "Ix", replacement: "I_{x}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Iy", replacement: "I_{y}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Iz", replacement: "I_{z}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "Icom", replacement: "I_{com}", options: "rmA"},

    
    //Physics 
    {trigger: "elec", replacement: "\\frac{ 1 }{ 4\\pi\\varepsilon_{o} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "mag", replacement: "\\frac{ \\mu_{o} }{ 4\\pi }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gra", replacement: "G\\frac{ m_{1}m_{2} }{ r^{2} }", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "emf", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\varepsilon r", replacement: "\\varepsilon_{r}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\mu r", replacement: "\\mu_{r}", options: "mA"},
    
   
    {trigger: "fk", replacement: "f_{k}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "fe", replacement: "f_{e}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "fs", replacement: "f_{s}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "f_{s}max", replacement: "f_{s(max)}", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "Patm", replacement: "P_{atm}", options: "mA"},


    // {trigger: "vd", replacement: "v_{d}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ohm", replacement: "\\ohm", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "\\frac{ dp }{ dt }hi", replacement: "\\frac{ d\\phi }{ dt }", options: "mA"},

    // Subsripts
    // {trigger: "u([a-zA-Z])", replacement: "_{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "net", replacement: "_{net}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "avg", replacement: "_{avg}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ind", replacement: "_{ind}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ext", replacement: "_{ext}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "eu", replacement: "_{e}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "hu", replacement: "_{h}", options: "mA"},
       

    // Vectors
    {trigger: "aa", replacement: "\\vec{a}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bb", replacement: "\\vec{b}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cc", replacement: "\\vec{c}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "dd", replacement: "\\vec{d}", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "vv", replacement: "\\vec{v}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "rr", replacement: "\\vec{r}", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "PP", replacement: "\\vec{P}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pp", replacement: "\\vec{p}", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "ff", replacement: "\\vec{f}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "EE", replacement: "\\vec{E}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "BB", replacement: "\\vec{B}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "SS", replacement: "\\vec{S}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "LL", replacement: "\\vec{L}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "MM", replacement: "\\vec{M}", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "ai", replacement: "a_{i}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bi", replacement: "b_{i}", options: "mA"},

    // Unit vectors
    {trigger: ":i", replacement: "\\mathbf{i}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":j", replacement: "\\mathbf{j}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":k", replacement: "\\mathbf{k}", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "ii", replacement: "\\hat{i}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "jj", replacement: "\\hat{j}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "kk", replacement: "\\hat{k}", options: "mA"},
    
    // {trigger: ":x", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{x}}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: ":y", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{y}}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: ":z", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{z}}", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "\\vec{a}a", replacement: "\\hat{a}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\vec{b}b", replacement: "\\hat{b}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\vec{c}c", replacement: "\\hat{c}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\vec{d}d", replacement: "\\hat{d}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\vec{r}r", replacement: "\\hat{r}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\vec{n}n", replacement: "\\hat{n}", options: "mA"},
    
    // Matrix
    {trigger: "a_{i}i", replacement: "a_{ii}", options: "mA"},



    // RMS of Current and Voltage
    {trigger: "irms", replacement: "i_{rms}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Vrms", replacement: "V_{rms}", options: "mA"},

    // Electronic Config
    {trigger: "s(\\d)", replacement: "s^{(\\d)}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "p(\\d)", replacement: "p^{(\\d)}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "d(\\d)", replacement: "d^{(\\d)}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "f(\\d)", replacement: "f^{(\\d)}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "t_{2}g", replacement: "t_{2g}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "eg", replacement: "e_{g}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "porbi\\tan \\alpha", replacement: "\\underset{ p_{x} }{ \\fbox{$0} } \\underset{ p_{y} }{ \\fbox{$1} } \\underset{ p_{z} }{ \\fbox{$2} }$3", options: "m"},
    

    // Hybridisations
    {trigger: "sp3", replacement: "sp^{3}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sp2", replacement: "sp^{2}", options: "mA"},

    
    {trigger: "rad", replacement: "^{.}", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "SN1", replacement: "S_{N}1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "SN2", replacement: "S_{N}2", options: "mA"},
    
    
        
    // Dashes
    // {trigger: "--", replacement: "–", options: "tA"},
    // {trigger: "–-", replacement: "—", options: "tA"},
    // {trigger: "—-", replacement: "---", options: "tA"},

    // States
    {trigger: "sol", replacement: "_{(s)}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "liq", replacement: "_{(l)}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gas", replacement: "_{(g)}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "aqu", replacement: "_{(aq)}", options: "mA"},

    // Ions
    {trigger: "++", replacement: "^{+}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "--", replacement: "^{-}", options: "mA"},
    
    
    // Trigonometry
    {trigger: "\\cos ec", replacement: "\\csc", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\sec", replacement: "\\sec", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sec", replacement: "\\sec", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cis", replacement: "cis($0)", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "eith", replacement: "e^{ i\\theta }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ei-th", replacement: "e^{ -i\\theta }", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "ssix", replacement: "\\sin^{2} x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "scox", replacement: "\\cos^{2} x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "stax", replacement: "\\tan^{2} x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sctx", replacement: "\\cot^{2} x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "scsx", replacement: "\\csc^{2} x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ssex", replacement: "\\sec^{2} x", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "six", replacement: "\\sin x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cox", replacement: "\\cos x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tax", replacement: "\\tan x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ctx", replacement: "\\cot x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "csx", replacement: "\\csc x", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sex", replacement: "\\sec x", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "sth", replacement: "\\sin \\theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cth", replacement: "\\cos \\theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tth", replacement: "\\tan \\theta", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "sal", replacement: "\\sin \\alpha", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cal", replacement: "\\cos \\alpha", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tal", replacement: "\\tan \\alpha", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "sph", replacement: "\\sin \\phi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cph", replacement: "\\cos \\phi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tph", replacement: "\\tan \\phi", options: "mA"},

    

    // Operations
    {trigger: "te", replacement: "\\text{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bf", replacement: "\\mathbf{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sr", replacement: "^{2}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cb", replacement: "^{3}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "rt", replacement: "^{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "_", replacement: "_{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pm", replacement: "\\pm", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sts", replacement: "_\\text{$0}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "sq", replacement: "\\sqrt{ $0 }$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "//", replacement: "\\frac{ $0 }{ $1 }$2", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ee", replacement: "e^{ $0 }$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "rm", replacement: "\\mathrm{$0}$1", options: "mA"},

    // Text before operations
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])res", replacement: "[[0]]_{res}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])max", replacement: "[[0]]_{max}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])min", replacement: "[[0]]_{min}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])ui", replacement: "[[0]]_{i}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z]),\\.", replacement: "\\mathbf{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])\\.,", replacement: "\\mathbf{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([A-Za-z])_{(\\d)}(\\d)", replacement: "[[0]]_{[[1]][[2]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([A-Za-z])(\\d)", replacement: "[[0]]_{[[1]]}", options: "rmA", description: "Auto letter subscript", priority: -1},
    {trigger: "\\\\mathbf{([A-Za-z])}(\\d)", replacement:"\\mathbf{[[0]]}_{[[1]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\hat{([A-Za-z])}(\\d)", replacement: "hat{[[0]]}_{[[1]]}", options: "rmA"},

    // Formatting
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])bar", replacement: "\\bar{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])hat", replacement: "\\hat{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])vec", replacement: "\\vec{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\upomega ve", replacement: "\\vec{\\upomega}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])ovl", replacement: "\\overline{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])ddot", replacement: "\\ddot{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])dot", replacement: "\\dot{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "not", replacement: "_{o}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "_{o}r", replacement: "^{o}", options: "rmA"},
    
    {trigger: "([a-zA-Z])nnn", replacement: "[[0]]_{n}", options: "rmA"},

    // Format Functions
    {trigger: "ddot", replacement: "\\ddot{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "conj", replacement: "^{*}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bar", replacement: "\\bar{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "hat", replacement: "\\hat{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "vec", replacement: "\\vec{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ovl", replacement: "\\overline{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "dot", replacement: "\\dot{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "deg", replacement: "^{\\circ}", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "([^\\\\])(arcsin|arccos|arctan|arccot|arccsc|arcsec|sin|cos|tan|cot|csc)", replacement: "[[0]]\\[[1]]", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(arcsin|arccos|arctan|arccot|arccsc|arcsec|sin|cos|tan|cot|csc)([A-Za-gi-z])", replacement: "\\[[0]] [[1]]", options: "rmA"}, // Insert space after trig funcs. Skips letter "h" to allow sinh, cosh, etc.
    {trigger: "\\\\(arcsinh|arccosh|arctanh|arccoth|arcsch|arcsech|sinh|cosh|tanh|coth|csch)([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\[[0]] [[1]]", options: "rmA"}, // Insert space after trig funcs
    {trigger: "trace", replacement: "\\mathrm{Tr}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "det", replacement: "\\det", options: "mA"},
    
    // Greek letters
    {trigger: "@a", replacement: "\\alpha", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@A", replacement: "\\Alpha", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@b", replacement: "\\beta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@B", replacement: "\\Beta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@c", replacement: "\\chi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@C", replacement: "\\Chi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@g", replacement: "\\gamma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":g", replacement: "\\upgamma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@G", replacement: "\\Gamma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@d", replacement: "\\delta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@D", replacement: "\\Delta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@e", replacement: "\\epsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@E", replacement: "\\Epsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":e", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@z", replacement: "\\zeta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@Z", replacement: "\\Zeta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@t", replacement: "\\theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@T", replacement: "\\Theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@k", replacement: "\\kappa", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@K", replacement: "\\Kappa", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@l", replacement: "\\lambda", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@L", replacement: "\\Lambda", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@m", replacement: "\\mu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@M", replacement: "\\Mu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@r", replacement: "\\rho", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@R", replacement: "\\Rho", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@s", replacement: "\\sigma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@S", replacement: "\\Sigma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@o", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":o", replacement: "\\upomega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@O", replacement: "\\Omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ";o", replacement: "\\ohm", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "mho", replacement: "\\mho", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@p", replacement: "\\phi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@P", replacement: "\\Phi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":t", replacement: "\\uptau", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "([^\\\\])(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL})", replacement: "[[0]]\\[[1]]", options: "rmA", description: "Add backslash before greek letters and symbols"},

    
    // Insert space after greek letters and symbols, etc
    {trigger: "\\upomega([a-zA-Z])", replacement: "upomega [[0]]", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\upgamma([a-zA-Z])", replacement: "upgamma [[0]]", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL})([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\[[0]] [[1]]", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\displaystyle([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\displaystyle [[0]]", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL}) sr", replacement: "\\[[0]]^{2}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL}) cb", replacement: "\\[[0]]^{3}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL}) rt", replacement: "\\[[0]]^{$0}$1", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL}) hat", replacement: "\\hat{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL}) dot", replacement: "\\dot{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL}) bar", replacement: "\\bar{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL}) vec", replacement: "\\vec{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL}) not", replacement: "\\[[0]]_{o}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK}),\\.", replacement: "\\mathbf{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\(${GREEK})\\.,", replacement: "\\mathbf{\\[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},


    // Visual operations
    {trigger: "U", replacement: "\\underbrace{ ${VISUAL} }_{ $0 }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "O", replacement: "\\overbrace{ ${VISUAL} }^{ $0 }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "B", replacement: "\\underset{ $0 }{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "I", replacement: "\\overset{ $0 }{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "C", replacement: "\\cancel{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "K", replacement: "\\cancelto{ $0 }{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "S", replacement: "\\sqrt{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "T", replacement: "\\text{${VISUAL}}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "P", replacement: "\\phantom{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "V", replacement: "\\vec{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "^", replacement: "^{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "_", replacement: "_{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "W", replacement: "\\ce{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "|", replacement: "| ${VISUAL} |", options: "mA"},
    

    
    //Sizes
    {trigger: "displ", replacement: "\\displaystyle ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "large", replacement: "\\large", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Large", replacement: "\\Large", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "LARGE", replacement: "\\LARGE", options: "mA"},
    

    // Symbols
    {trigger: "ooo", replacement: "\\infty", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sum", replacement: "\\sum ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "prod", replacement: "\\prod", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lim", replacement: "\\lim_{ ${0:n} \\to ${1:\\infty} } $2", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pm", replacement: "\\pm", options: "m"},

    
    // Arrows
    {trigger: "to", replacement: "\\to", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "...", replacement: "\\dots", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "<->", replacement: "\\leftrightarrow ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "->", replacement: "\\to", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "..>", replacement: "\\longrightarrow ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "<..", replacement: "\\longleftarrow ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "upup", replacement: "\\uparrow", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "dodn", replacement: "\\downarrow", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "!>", replacement: "\\mapsto", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "imp", replacement: "\\implies", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "=<", replacement: "\\impliedby", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "\\leq>", replacement: "\\Longleftrightarrow", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "rlha", replacement: "\\rightleftharpoons", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "invs", replacement: "^{-1}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\\\", replacement: "\\setminus", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "||", replacement: "\\mid", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "and", replacement: "\\cap", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "orr", replacement: "\\cup", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "inn", replacement: "\\in", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\subset eq", replacement: "\\subseteq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "set", replacement: "\\{ $0 \\}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "iff", replacement: "\\iff", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "e\\xi sts", replacement: "\\exists", options: "mA", priority: 1},
    {trigger: "===", replacement: "\\equiv", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Sq", replacement: "\\square", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "!=", replacement: "\\neq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ">=", replacement: "\\geq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "<=", replacement: "\\leq", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "<+>", replacement: "<=>", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ">>", replacement: "\\gg", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "<<", replacement: "\\ll", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "~~", replacement: "\\sim", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "approx", replacement: "\\approx", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cong", replacement: "\\cong", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "nabl", replacement: "\\nabla", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "del", replacement: "\\Delta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "xx", replacement: "\\times", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "***", replacement: "\\cdot", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "prop", replacement: "\\propto", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pal", replacement: "\\parallel", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "^{*}\\parallel ", replacement: "\\upharpoonleft \\! \\downharpoonright", options: "mA"},
    


    {trigger: "xnn", replacement: "x_{n}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\xii", replacement: "x_{i}", options: "mA", priority: 1},
    {trigger: "xjj", replacement: "x_{j}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "xp1", replacement: "x_{n+1}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ynn", replacement: "y_{n}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "yii", replacement: "y_{i}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "yjj", replacement: "y_{j}", options: "mA"},


    // Mathcal
    // {trigger: "m\\cos \\alpha l", replacement: "\\mathcal{$0}$1", options: "rmA", priority: 1},
    // {trigger: "ell", replacement: "\\ell", options: "mA"},

    
    // {trigger: "LL", replacement: "\\mathcal{L}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "HH", replacement: "\\mathcal{H}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "CC", replacement: "\\mathbb{C}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "RR", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "ZZ", replacement: "\\mathbb{Z}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "NN", replacement: "\\mathbb{N}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "II", replacement: "\\mathbb{1}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "\\mathbb{1}I", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbb{1}}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "AA", replacement: "\\mathcal{A}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "BB", replacement: "\\mathbf{B}", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "EE", replacement: "\\mathbf{E}", options: "mA"},
    

    //Scalar Triple Product
    {trigger: "stp([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])", replacement: "[\\vec{[[0]]} \\,\\,\\, \\vec{[[1]]} \\,\\,\\, \\vec{[[2]]}]", options: "rm"},

    {trigger: "stp", replacement: "[\\vec{${0:a}} \\,\\,\\, \\vec{${1:a}} \\,\\,\\, \\vec{${2:a}}]$3", options: "rm"},


    // Derivatives
    {trigger: "par", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial ${0:y} }{ \\partial ${1:x} } $2", options: "m"},
    
    {trigger: "der", replacement: "\\frac{ d${0:y} }{ d${1:x} } $2", options: "m"},
    
    {trigger: "pa2", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial^{2} ${0:y} }{ \\partial ${1:x}^{2} } $2", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "de1", replacement: "\\frac{ d ${0:y} }{ d ${1:x} } $2", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "de2", replacement: "\\frac{ d^{2} ${0:y} }{ d ${1:x}^{2} } $2", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "pa3", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial^{3} ${0:y} }{ \\partial ${1:x}^{3} } $2", options: "mA"},
    
    {trigger: "pa([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial [[0]] }{ \\partial [[1]] } ", options: "rm"},
    
    {trigger: "pa([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial^{2} [[0]] }{ \\partial [[1]] \\partial [[2]] } ", options: "rm"},
    
    {trigger: "pa([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])2", replacement: "\\frac{ \\partial^{2} [[0]] }{ \\partial [[1]]^{2} } ", options: "rmA"},
    
    {trigger: "de([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])", replacement: "\\frac{ d[[0]] }{ d[[1]] } ", options: "rm", priority: -1},
    
    {trigger: "de([A-Z])t", replacement: "\\frac{ d\[[[0]]\] }{ dt } ", options: "rm"},
    
    {trigger: "de([A-Za-z])([A-Za-z])2", replacement: "\\frac{ d^{2}[[0]] }{ d[[1]]^{2} } ", options: "rmA"},
    
    {trigger: "ddt", replacement: "\\frac{d}{dt} ", options: "mA"},



    // Integrals
    {trigger: "oinf", replacement: "\\int_{0}^{\\infty} $0 \\, d${1:x} $2", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "infi", replacement: "\\int_{-\\infty}^{\\infty} $0 \\, d${1:x} $2", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "dint", replacement: "\\int_{${0:0}}^{${1:\\infty}} $2 \\, d${3:x} $4", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "oint", replacement: "\\oint ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "iiint", replacement: "\\iiint", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "iint", replacement: "\\iint", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "int", replacement: "\\int $0 \\, d${1:x} $2", options: "mA"},



    // Physics
    {trigger: "kbt", replacement: "k_{B}T", options: "mA"},


    // Quantum mechanics
    {trigger: "hba", replacement: "\\hbar", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "dag", replacement: "^{\\dagger}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bra", replacement: "\\bra{$0} $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ket", replacement: "\\ket{$0} $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "brk", replacement: "\\braket{ $0 | $1 } $2", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\\\bra{([^|]+)\\|", replacement: "\\braket{ [[0]] | $0 ", options: "rmA", description: "Convert bra into braket"},
    {trigger: "\\\\bra{(.+)}([^ ]+)>", replacement: "\\braket{ [[0]] | $0 ", options: "rmA", description: "Convert bra into braket (alternate)"},
    {trigger: "outp", replacement: "\\ket{${0:\\psi}} \\bra{${0:\\psi}} $1", options: "mA"},



    // Chemistry
    {trigger: "pupu", replacement: "\\pu{ $0 }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "msun", replacement: "M_{\\odot}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "solm", replacement: "M_{\\odot}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ce", replacement: "\\ce{ $0 }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "iso", replacement: "{}_{${0:2}}${1:He}^{${2:4}}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "hel4", replacement: "{}^{4}_{2}He ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "hel3", replacement: "{}^{3}_{2}He ", options: "mA"},



    // Environments
    {trigger: "pmat", replacement: "\\begin{pmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{pmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bmat", replacement: "\\begin{bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{bmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Bmat", replacement: "\\begin{Bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Bmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "vmat", replacement: "\\begin{vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{vmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Vmat", replacement: "\\begin{Vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Vmatrix}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "case", replacement: "\\begin{cases}\n$0\n\\end{cases}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "align", replacement: "\\begin{align}\n$0\n\\end{align}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "array", replacement: "\\begin{array}\n$0\n\\end{array}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "matrix", replacement: "\\begin{matrix}\n$0\n\\end{matrix}", options: "mA"},



    // Brackets
    {trigger: "lr(", replacement: "\\left( $0 \\right) $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lr|", replacement: "\\left| $0 \\right| $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lr{", replacement: "\\left\\{ $0 \\right\\} $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lr[", replacement: "\\left[ $0 \\right] $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lra", replacement: "\\left< $0 \\right> $1", options: "mA"},
    // {trigger: "avg", replacement: "\\langle $0 \\rangle $1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "(${VISUAL})", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "[", replacement: "[${VISUAL}]", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "{", replacement: "{${VISUAL}}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "($0)$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "{", replacement: "{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "[", replacement: "[$0]$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "mod", replacement: "|$0|$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "norm", replacement: "\\|$0\\|$1", options: "mA", priority: 1},



    // Misc
    {trigger: "tayl", replacement: "${0:f}(${1:x} + ${2:h}) = ${0:f}(${1:x}) + ${0:f}'(${1:x})${2:h} + ${0:f}''(${1:x}) \\frac{${2:h}^{2}}{2!} + \\dots$3", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "binom", replacement: "{}^{n}C", options: "mA"},
]
matrixShortcutsEnvNames: pmatrix, cases, align, bmatrix, Bmatrix, vmatrix, Vmatrix, array, matrix
